name: Weekly Elite Hunting
description: Hunt down the most dangerous and powerful creatures in existence.
Only the bravest hunters dare challenge these legendary beasts!
• Ender Dragons - Rulers of the End realm
⚠️ WARNING: These creatures are extremely dangerous!

objectives.elite_hunter: Consult with the Master Hunter about elite targets
objectives.elder_guardians: Slay 5 Elder Guardians in ocean monuments
objectives.ender_dragons: Kill 2 Ender Dragons in the End realm
objectives.wardens: Destroy 1 Warden in the deep dark
objectives.elite_trophies: Collect 10 Elite Monster Trophies as proof
objectives.claim_bounty: Claim bounty rewards from Master Hunter
